name: Letters of Love
description: Magister Baulro admits that he deceived Darin about the potion in order to bolster his courage. He gives you a medicine bottle filled with tap water. Take it to Darin in the village square.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Darin of Talking Island Village has fallen in love with Gatekeeper Roxxy. He is too shy to express his feelings and asks you to deliver his love letter to her.", "npc": {"id": "1", "name": "Darin", "additional": null, "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": null}, {"number": 2, "title": "Delivery of Love Letters", "description": "Darin of Talking Island Village has fallen in love with Gatekeeper Roxxy. She asks you to deliver her kerchief to him. Take Roxxy's kerchief to Darin in the village square.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 4, "title": "Baulro's Magic Potion", "description": "Darin is overjoyed to learn that Roxxy returns his admiration, and says he wants to ask her for a date. He asks you to go and get a love potion promised to him by Magister Baulro at the temple.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 5, "title": "Water that Brings Out Courage", "description": "Magister Baulro admits that he deceived Darin about the potion in order to bolster his courage. name: What Women Want
description: Magister Greenis informs you that she loves another. Take Greenis' letter of refusal to Arujian.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Arujien confesses to you that he has pined for Magister Greenis for a long time. He asks you to find out if Greenis returns his affection. Meet with her younger sister, Gatekeeper Mirabel, and show her Arujien's letter.", "npc": {"id": "2", "name": "Arujien", "additional": null, "icon": "skill4416_elf"}, "item": null}, {"number": 2, "title": "Arujien's Letter", "description": "Arujien confesses to you that he has pined for Magister Greenis for a long time. Meet with her younger sister, Gatekeeper Mirabel, and show her Arujien's letter.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 3, "title": "Uncle Herbiel", "description": "Gatekeeper Mirabel says that she doesn't get involved in her sister's affairs. Show him Arujien's Letter.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 4, "title": "Uncle's Advice", "description": "Trader Herbiel thinks that Magister Greenis likes Arujien. name: Will the Seal be Broken?
description: You have collected all the ingredients required for a spell. Return to Hierarch Talloth.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Dark Elven Tetrarch Talloth is continuing in the studies of the dark arts in order to break the seal that binds Mitraell, the leader of the Dark Elves. He asks that you to go to the school of the Dark Arts and bring him an Omen Beast's eye, a Taint Stone and Succubus Blood which are all needed to break the Seal. This being the first stage among three stages that binds the great leader. Monsters to be hunted - Omen Beast, Tainted Zombies, Stink Zombies, Lesser Succubi, Lesser Succubus Turen and Lesser Succubus TilfosSuccubus BloodNGx30", "npc": {"id": "3", "name": "Talloth", "additional": "Tetrarch", "icon": "skill4416_darkelf"}, "item": {"id": "1083", "name": "Succubus Blood", "icon": "etc_lesser_potion_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Preparation for a Ritual", "description": "Dark Elven Tetrarch Talloth is continuing in the studies of the dark arts in order to break the seal that binds Mitraell, the leader of the Dark Elves. This being the first stage among three stages that binds the great leader. Monsters to be hunted - Omen Beast, Tainted Zombies, Stink Zombies, Lesser Succubi, Lesser Succubus Turen and Lesser Succubus TilfosSuccubus BloodNGx30", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1083", "name": "Succubus Blood", "icon": "etc_lesser_potion_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Return to Tetrarch Talloth", "description": "You have collected all the ingredients required for a spell. name: Long live the Pa'agrio Lord!
description: You have collected all of the tributes for Pa'agrio Lord Kakai. Take them to Centurion Nakusin.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "You must meet with the following tribal representatives: Tataru Zu Hestui of the dignified Hestui tribe; Chief Varkees of the cold-blooded Atuba tribe; Warehouse Keeper Grookin of the formidable Neruga tribe; Gantaki Zu Urutu of the strong-willed Urutu tribe; Trader Kunai of the tactical Dudamara tribe; Trader Uska of the ruthless Gandi tribe.Deep Sea OrbNG", "npc": {"id": "4", "name": "Nakusin", "additional": "Centurion", "icon": "skill4416_orc"}, "item": {"id": "1546", "name": "Deep Sea Orb", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Gifts from the Six Tribes", "description": "You must meet with the following tribal representatives: Tataru Zu Hestui of the dignified Hestui tribe; Chief Varkees of the cold-blooded Atuba tribe; Warehouse Keeper Grookin of the formidable Neruga tribe; Gantaki Zu Urutu of the strong-willed Urutu tribe; Trader Kunai of the tactical Dudamara tribe; Trader Uska of the ruthless Gandi tribe.Deep Sea OrbNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1546", "name": "Deep Sea Orb", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Return to Nakusin", "description": "You have collected all of the tributes for Pa'agrio Lord Kakai. Take them to Centurion Nakusin.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Miner's Favor
description: You have all of the items Bolter requested. Take them to him.

name: Step into the Future
description: Recognizing your youthful vigor and ambition, Sir Collin Windawood agrees to sponsor your trip to Giran. Visit Gatekeeper Roxxy and tell her what Sir Windawood said.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "You've decided to experience all the adventure this world has to offer, but you can't afford it. name: A Trip Begins

name: An Adventure Begins
description: Magister Harne has seen the two sisters, Roselyn and Jasmine, fighting for a long time. She asks you to return to Jasmine and deliver her message.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Gatekeeper Jasmine ignores your request and says that you're as reckless as Roselyn was when she was young. description: You've got the permission from Warehouse Chief Reed. Return to Silver Scale's Balanki and start your trip.

name: Red-Eyed Invaders
description: After much searching, you've discovered the clues to the conspiracy! Return to Captain Bathis.

name: Sword of Solidarity
description: Take the broken sword handle to Blacksmith Altran so he can restore the sword of solidarity to its original condition.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Grand Master Roien of Cedric's Training Hall wants to restore the sword of solidarity. He explains that the sword was made long ago to symbolize the friendship between Elves and Humans. He mentions that Blacksmith Altran is also very interested in restoring this relic. He asks you to take the letter containing the results of his investigation of the relic to Altran in the Blacksmith Shop.", "npc": {"id": "101", "name": "Roien", "additional": "Grand Master", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "739", "name": "Broken Sword Handle", "icon": "weapon_small_sword_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Broken Sword", "description": "Grand Master Roien of Cedric's Training Hall wants to restore the sword of solidarity. He explains that the sword was made long ago to symbolize the friendship between Elves and Humans. He mentions that Blacksmith Altran is also very interested in restoring this relic. He asks you to take the letter containing the results of his investigation of the relic to Altran in the Blacksmith Shop.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "739", "name": "Broken Sword Handle", "icon": "weapon_small_sword_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Broken Sword Blade Piece", "description": "Blacksmith Altran explains that if he is to restore the Sword of Solidarity to its original condition, he must have the two pieces of the blade. He asks you to go the Elven Ruins and obtain the broken sword blade pieces from the Orcs there. Hunt Tunath Orc Warriors and Tunath Orc Marksmen.Broken Blade TopNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "739", "name": "Broken Sword Handle", "icon": "weapon_small_sword_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "Return to Blacksmith Altran", "description": "Take the broken sword blade pieces to Blacksmith Altran.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "739", "name": "Broken Sword Handle", "icon": "weapon_small_sword_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 5, "title": "Last Parts", "description": "While Blacksmith Altran joins the sword blade pieces together, go to Cedric's Training Hall and obtain the broken sword handle from Grand Master Roien.Broken Sword HandleNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "739", "name": "Broken Sword Handle", "icon": "weapon_small_sword_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 6, "title": "Sword of Solidarity", "description": "Take the broken sword handle to Blacksmith Altran so he can restore the sword of solidarity to its original condition.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Sea of Spores Fever
description: You have distributed the fever medicine. Report back to Sentinel Knight Alberius.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Sentinel Knight Alberius tells you that the Elven researchers who have recently gone to the Sea of Spores have come down with a fever. He is concerned about the guards he has dispatched there and asks for your help. He tells you that Master Cobendell has the cure for the fever but needs the ingredients to make the antidote. Go to Master Cobendell and help him to collect the ingredients he needs.", "npc": {"id": "102", "name": "Alberius", "additional": "Sentinel Knight", "icon": "skill4416_elf"}, "item": {"id": "966", "name": "Dryad's Tears", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_green_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Cure for Fever", "description": "Sentinel Knight Alberius tells you that the Elven researchers who have recently gone to the Sea of Spores have come down with a fever. He is concerned about the guards he has dispatched there and asks for your help. He tells you that Master Cobendell has the cure for the fever but needs the ingredients to make the antidote. Go to Master Cobendell and help him to collect the ingredients he needs.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "966", "name": "Dryad's Tears", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_green_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Dryad's Tears", "description": "You must collect dryad's tears to make the cure for the fever. Collect 10 dryad's tears in the Elven Forest and take them to Master Cobendell. Hunt dryads and dryad elders.Dryad's TearsNGx10", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "966", "name": "Dryad's Tears", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_green_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "Return to Cobendell", "description": "You have collected all the necessary Dryad tears. Take them to Master Cobendell in the Elven Village.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 5, "title": "Medicine Created", "description": "The medicine for the fever has been created! Take it to Sentinel Knight Alberius.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 6, "title": "Delivery of Medicine", "description": "Sentinel Knight Alberius asks you to deliver the fever medicine to four sentinels who have gone to the Sea of Spores. Take the medicine to Sentinel Berros, Sentinel Veltress, Sentinel Rayen and Sentinel Gartrandell.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 7, "title": "Return to Sentinel Knight Alberius", "description": "You have distributed the fever medicine. Report back to Sentinel Knight Alberius.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Spirit of Craftsman
description: Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon has conjured the soul of Steelbender by using the soul catcher. He then channels the spirit into the zombie head. Take it to Blacksmith Karrod before it starts to rot.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "The Dark Elven Blacksmith, Karrod, wishes to conjure the spirit of Warsmith Roberto Steelbender in order to learn how to refine oriharukon ore. He asks for help in summoning the dead man's spirit. Visit Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon of the Temple of Shilen.", "npc": {"id": "103", "name": "Karrod", "additional": "Blacksmith", "icon": "skill4416_darkelf"}, "item": {"id": "973", "name": "Zombie Head", "icon": "etc_skull_black_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Method of Refining Oriharukon Ore", "description": "The Dark Elven Blacksmith, Karrod, wishes to conjure the spirit of Warsmith Roberto Steelbender in order to learn how to refine oriharukon ore. He asks for help in summoning the dead man's spirit. Visit Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon of the Temple of Shilen.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "973", "name": "Zombie Head", "icon": "etc_skull_black_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Net for Tying Up Dead Spirits", "description": "Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon tells you that in order to summon Steelbender from the Well of Dead Souls he will need a soul catcher. name: Spirit of Mirrors
description: You have sealed all three of the spirits of mirrors with Gallint's oak wand! Return to Grand Magister Gallint.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "The spirits of mirrors that Grand Magister Gallint was studying have escaped! Hit each one of them with Gallint's oak wand to seal them. name: Skirmish with the Orcs
description: You've successfully accomplished Kendell's second order! Return to Sentinel Kendell in the Elven Village and make your report to him.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Orcs have recently made several attacks upon the Elven Forest. Read the order from Sentinel Kendell and hunt the Orcs!Kaboo Chief's 1st TorqueNG", "npc": {"id": "105", "name": "Kendell", "additional": "Sentinel", "icon": "skill4416_elf"}, "item": {"id": "1845", "name": "Kaboo Chief's 2nd Torque", "icon": "accessary_necklace_of_black_ore_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Guardian of the Forest", "description": "Orcs have recently made several attacks upon the Elven Forest. name: Forgotten Truth
description: The translation of 'Kaysha's Revelations' is complete. Tetrarch Thifiell is waiting for you.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Dark Elven Tetrarch Thifiell asked Abyssal Celebrant Kartia to translate an ancient manuscript. steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Varangka, Shaman of Darkness, is scheming to destroy the kingdom of the Orcs. name: Jumble, Tumble, Diamond Fuss
description: You finally recover the star diamond. Pray for the soul of the poor bat then take the star diamond to Collector Gouph.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Collector Gouph of the Bronze Key Guild has purchased a rare star diamond from Trader Reep of the Silver Scales Guild. It is one of only twelve on the continent! Three days have past since the agreed-upon delivery date and Gouph is becoming impatient. He asks you to go to Trader Reep, retrieve the star diamond and bring it to him.", "npc": {"id": "108", "name": "Gouph", "additional": "Collector", "icon": "skill4416_dwarf"}, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "In Search of a Star Diamond!", "description": "Collector Gouph of the Bronze Key Guild has purchased a rare star diamond from Trader Reep of the Silver Scales Guild. It is one of only twelve on the continent! Three days have past since the agreed-upon delivery date and Gouph is becoming impatient. He asks you to go to Trader Reep, retrieve the star diamond and bring it to him.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Carrier Torocco", "description": "Trader Reep informs you that he gave the star diamond to Carrier Torocco to deliver to Gouph. Find Torocco and ask him about the diamond.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "Booze can make you lose!", "description": "Torocco got drunk with Miner Maron last night and passed out. When he awoke, his weapons, armor, money and even the star diamond had been stolen! Find Maron and ask him what happened.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 5, "title": "Gambling can make you a loser, too!", "description": "Carrier Torocco is usually quite trustworthy, but.when he starts drinking he inevitably starts gambling. He got drunk last night and lost everything he had in a dice game with Blacksmith Brunon. Could this mean that Blacksmith Brunon has the star diamond?", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 6, "title": "Brunon's Request", "description": "Indeed, Blacksmith Brunon won the star diamond in a dice game! He tells you that he will give it to you if you recover the aquamarine and chrysoberyl that were stolen by a goblin brigand lieutenant.ChrysoberylNGx10", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 7, "title": "Return to Blacksmith Brunon", "description": "You have recovered the aquamarines and chrysoberyls that Blacksmith Brunon lost. Take them to him.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 8, "title": "Gem Box", "description": "Brunon gives you the gem box he says he won in a dice game. Take it to Gouph.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 9, "title": "Useless Coal", "description": "The gem box doesn't contain the star diamond, only a strange looking piece of coal! Return to Blacksmith Brunon and demand an explanation!", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 10, "title": "A Chest of Mistaken Identity", "description": "The piece of coal once belonged to Warehouse Freightman Murdoc. Take the letter from Brunon to Murdoc and exchange it for the gem box that contains the star diamond.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 11, "title": "The Diamond Is Gone!", "description": "The star diamond was eaten by a bat that Warehouse Keeper Airy keeps as a pet! The bat escaped out of an open window! Go quickly and speak with Airy!", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 12, "title": "Who keeps a bat as a pet, anyway?", "description": "Warehouse Keeper Airy asks you to find her pet, a blade bat. Kill the bat and get the diamond.Star DiamondNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1571", "name": "Star Diamond", "icon": "etc_jewel_silver_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 13, "title": "Small Sacrifice, Great Reward", "description": "You finally recover the star diamond. Pray for the soul of the poor bat then take the star diamond to Collector Gouph.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Temple Champion - 2
description: Preacher Sla says that the religious association claims their legitimacy without any convincing evidence, and they are obsessed with proving their legitimacy because the foundation of the association was political and based on manipulated truth. He also says that it is wrong to establish power by using the name of the god. Deliver this message of Sla to High Priest Sylvain
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Conclusive evidence of the advent of the angel means a lot to the religious association established by Emperor Shunaiman who was in contact with the angel in the past. The religious association is going to send a manifesto to declare that the advent of the angel proves the legitimacy of the association to the groups against them. Talk to High Priest Sylvain in order to undertake the mission to deliver the manifesto.", "npc": {"id": "138", "name": "Sylvain", "additional": "High Priest", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "10342", "name": "Relics of the Dark Elf Trainee", "icon": "etc_oil_pot_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Position of the Temple", "description": "Conclusive evidence of the advent of the angel means a lot to the religious association established by Emperor Shunaiman who was in contact with the angel in the past. name: Shadow Fox - 1
description: You need to complete Warehouse Keeper Mia's request in order to meet Shadow Fox. Eliminate Tasaba Lizardmen of Field of Silence and bring both the document box and the pieces of the key to the document box. You need at least more than 10 pieces of the key to the document box and more than 1 document box to check the document box. Monsters to be hunted - Tasaba Lizardman, Tasaba Lizardman Magician.Records ChestNG

name: Fallen Angel - Request of Dawn
description: Finally, you eliminated the fallen angel and got her blood. Report it to High Priest Raymond in Gludio Castle Town right now.Fallen Angel BloodNG
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Among the two requests that Shadow Fox introduced, you selected the request of the religious association and Rulers of Dawn. description: You have delivered the salvaged goods. Report to Guard Arnold.

name: Sacrifice to the Sea
description: Warehouse Keeper Rolfe has made the doll and attached its hair. Take the finished doll to Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "In order to calm the violent storms that have battered the island, Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell is planning a ritual sacrifice to the goddess Shilen. The original ritual calls for a live maiden, but he decides to offer a doll instead. To make the hair of the doll, he needs fox fur. Hunt keltirs around the village and take 10 units of fox fur to Cristel in the village.Fox FurNGx10", "npc": {"id": "154", "name": "Rockswell", "additional": "Lighthouse Keeper", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "1032", "name": "Fox Fur", "icon": "etc_mane_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Ritual for Shilen", "description": "In order to calm the violent storms that have battered the island, Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell is planning a ritual sacrifice to the goddess Shilen. name: Millennium Love
description: Master Baenedes bears a remarkable resemblance to Theon. He was one of his best students, and learned to use both the sword and bow from him. Sadly, Theon passed away to be with Eva several years ago. Baenedes asks you to deliver Theon's diary to Lilith.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Lilith has pined for her lost love for over a thousand years in the temple of Talking Island. She lost her lover, Theon, in the war against Beleth. Because his body was never recovered, she has never accepted his death. She asks you to look for him on your way to Gludio.", "npc": {"id": "156", "name": "Lilith", "additional": null, "icon": "skill4416_elf"}, "item": null}, {"number": 2, "title": "Whereabouts of the Lost Lover", "description": "Lilith has pined for her lost love for over a thousand years in the temple of Talking Island. Baenedes asks you to deliver Theon's diary to Lilith.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Protect the Water Source
description: You've obtained enough plague dust for the purification ritual. Deliver it to Hierarch Asterios.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Elven Hierarch Asterios is concerned that the Mother Tree of the village is being contaminated. name: Fruit of the Mother Tree
description: Thalia gives you the fruit of the Mother Tree that was harvested some time ago. This was the only fruit she harvested this year. She asks you to carefully take it to her sister Andellia.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Andellia and her sisters care for the Mother Trees. You received a letter informing you that the Mother Tree near Iris Lake, maintained by their younger sister Thalia, has borne fruit. name: Curse of the Underground Fortress
description: You've collected all the skulls and bone pieces needed to break the curse. Return to the Elven Village and give them to Trader Unoren.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Trader Unoren asks that you bring him bone fragments of undead monsters and skulls of Elves. name: Blood Fiend

steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Trader Creamees' friends and family were all killed by the dark side. name: Shilen's Hunt
description: You've collected all 13 dark bezoars. Take them to Sentry Nelsya immediately and claim your prize and the honor of being this year's best hunter.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Shilen's Hunt will soon be held in the Dark Elf Village. Wild game will be hunted and offered as an sacrifice. Hunt Young Brown Keltirs, Brown Keltirs, Elder Brown Keltirs and Ashen Wolves, obtain dark bezoars and take them to Sentry Nelsya.Dark BezoarNGx999", "npc": {"id": "165", "name": "Nelsya", "additional": "Sentry", "icon": "skill4416_darkelf"}, "item": {"id": "1160", "name": "Dark Bezoar", "icon": "etc_bead_gold_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Shilen's Hunt", "description": "Shilen's Hunt will soon be held in the Dark Elf Village. name: Mass of Darkness
description: You've obtained the ceremonial dagger, the dreviant wine and Garmiel's scripture that are needed for the Mass. Take them to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Dwarven Kinship
description: Haprock thanks you for delivering the letter to him. He asks you to deliver a letter to Warehouse Keeper Norman in Gludin Village. The letter is supposed to be from Norman's wife, longing for him in his hometown... Do you believe him...?

description: You have delivered all the swords. Take the bronze swords to Sentry Jenna.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Sentry Jenna says that according to Tetrarch Kaitar's prophecy, the Dark Forest will soon be invaded by outside forces. name: Offspring of Nightmares
description: You have obtained intact skulls of dark horrors. Take them to Magister Vlasty for a reward. He also pays for broken skulls, but not as much.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Magister Vlasty asks you to hunt Dark Horrors and bring the skulls back to him. name: Dangerous Seduction
description: Merkenis's dying words were about Lich King Icarus. Who is he? What was the source of Tetrarch Vellior's torment? Take the nightmare crystal to the Tetrarch and make a report.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Dark Elven Tetrarch Vellior cannot sleep because of terrible nightmares caused by a succubus. name: Acts of Evil
description: The Orc invasion of Gludin Village has been averted. Report to Guard Alvah.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "A cargo wagon transporting goods to the Dark Forest was ambushed by Turek Orcs. Guard Alvah requests that you recover the stolen cargo. You should first speak with Trader Arodin at the weapons shop in Gludin Village.", "npc": {"id": "171", "name": "Alvah", "additional": "Guard", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "4249", "name": "Ol Mahum Captain's Head", "icon": "etc_skull_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Stolen Cargo", "description": "A cargo wagon transporting goods to the Dark Forest was ambushed by Turek Orcs. Monsters to hunt: Turek Orc Footmen, Turek Orc Suppliers, Turek Orc Skirmishers, and Turek Orc Archers.Blade MoldNGx20", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "4249", "name": "Ol Mahum Captain's Head", "icon": "etc_skull_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "Tyra's Bill", "description": "You have recovered the stolen cargo and delivered it to Tyra. Begin by confronting the tumran bugbears that are found there.Ranger's Report - Part 4NG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "4249", "name": "Ol Mahum Captain's Head", "icon": "etc_skull_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 7, "title": "Proof Regarding Suspicious Activities", "description": "It is becoming obvious that the ol mahums and Dwarven traders have formed an alliance. name: Relic Exploration

name: Trial of Duty
description: Priest Dustin thanks you and gives you a letter describing your efforts. Take it to Grand Master Hannavalt.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Sometimes, being a mere Knight just isn't enough. Knights who wish to advance should find Sir Aron Tanford south of the Wastelands and undergo the Trial of Duty.", "npc": {"id": "212", "name": "Hannavalt", "additional": "Grand Master", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Finding Sir Aron Tanford", "description": "Sometimes, being a mere Knight just isn't enough. Knights who wish to advance should find Sir Aron Tanford south of the Wastelands and undergo the Trial of Duty.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Spirit of Sir Herod", "description": "A true Knight must always seek to restore honor when possible. Sir Herod, after betraying his troops and dying in disgrace, has been resurrected as an evil spirit. Kill the undead skeletons that haunt the Wastelands and you'll meet him. You must destroy him with the old knight sword in order to restore his honor. Return to Sir Aron Tanford when you've finished off Sir Herod. Monsters to Hunt - Skeleton Marauder, Skeleton Raider and Ghost of Sir HerodKnight's TearNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "Return to Sir Aron Tanford", "description": "You've obtained the tears of a Knight. Deliver them to Sir Aron Tanford.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 5, "title": "Toward the Second Trial", "description": "Unfortunately, Sir Herod was beyond redemption. That can't be helped now. Speak with Sir Kiel Nighthawk in the Dark Elf Guild of the Town of Dion to receive your second mission.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 6, "title": "Report of Sir Talianus", "description": "There's been a vicious massacre in Dion! Sir Talianus's report for the King was ripped up and his soldiers have become undead! Obtain the torn pieces of the report from the undead in the Dion Execution Grounds and restore the report of Sir Talianus. Monsters to Hunt - Strains, GhoulsReport PieceNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 7, "title": "To Sir Kiel Nighthawk", "description": "You've restored the report of Sir Talianus. Now take it to Sir Kiel Nighthawk in the Town of Dion.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 8, "title": "Eternal Return for Sir Talianus", "description": "Take this report, find the spirit of Sir Talianus and promise to submIt to the King on his behalf. This will allow his spirit to at last rest in peace. Meet the spirit of Sir Talianus by destroying the hangman tree that suppresses his soul. Monster to Hunt - Hangman Tree", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 9, "title": "Meeting with Sir Talianus", "description": "The seal that suppressed Sir Talianus has been broken. Speak with his ghost.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 10, "title": "Huge Atonement", "description": "Sir Talianus asks you to deliver his report to the King. His spirit can't rest in peace until his sins are redeemed and justice is restored to the land of Dion. Return to Sir Kiel Nighthawk and tell him what you've learned.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 11, "title": "A Knight in Hunters Village", "description": "Sir Kiel offers to investigate the matters regarding Sir Talianus. He tells you go to Hunters Village and meet with Sir Isael Silvershadow to receive your next orders.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 12, "title": "Militia's Articles", "description": "Isael Silvershadow asks you to bring back the belongings of a militia who died defending the territory. Grand Master Hannavalt sends word to Isael asking him to send you to Priest Dustin in Giran Castle Town one more time.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 15, "title": "The Bones of Leon Athebaldt", "description": "Priest Dustin tells you the story of Leon Athebaldt, the protector of the will of Einhasad. Monster to Hunt - Breka Orc OverlordAthebaldt's ShinNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2645", "name": "Athebaldt's Shin", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_white_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 16, "title": "Return to Dustin", "description": "You've retrieved the bones of Sir Leon Athebaldt. Take it to Grand Master Hannavalt.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Trial of the Seeker
description: You've removed the abyss runestones from the monsters. Now take them to Master Terry.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Mutant evil spirits threaten the kingdom. The guild has decided to begin a secret investigation into their activities. name: Trial of the Scholar
description: Elder Cronos says that the Scriptures of Knowledge are merely one interpretation of the greater Tablet of Maphr, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry - translated by the giants from the Gods themselves! He continues to say that the authors had to discontinue their work once it was realized that the dark secrets contained within were too powerful for this world. He is very pleased with you and what you have brought him and gives you something in return. Return to Magister Mirien.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "To advance your learning, you must pass the Trial of the Scholar. Find the renowned Mystics and do as they say! First, you should seek out High Priest Sylvain in the Town of Dion.", "npc": {"id": "214", "name": "Mirien", "additional": "Magister", "icon": "skill4416_elf"}, "item": {"id": "2709", "name": "Scripture Chapter 4", "icon": "weapon_apprentices_spellbook_i01", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "In Search of High Priest Sylvain", "description": "To advance your learning, you must pass the Trial of the Scholar. She tells you that the scroll containing the secret method was stolen a month ago. Find Captain Lucas and ask him what happened.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 5, "title": "The Unrecovered Scroll", "description": "Unfortunately, Maria's scroll has not yet been found. She asks you to speak with Creta in Floran Village.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 7, "title": "Searching for Clues", "description": "Creta asks you to find clues regarding the robbery. She was a friend of Maria's who was there when the robbery happened. It might hold a clue! Take it to Creta.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 9, "title": "Shadow of the Criminal", "description": "Creta see the culprit's shadow in the handbag. Could it be the shadow of a Human?", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 10, "title": "A Very Mysterious Shadow", "description": "Maria asks that you show the shadow to Captain Lucas, an expert in such matters.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 11, "title": "Was It a Lizardman's Shadow?", "description": "Captain Lucas isn't sure that the shadow belongs to the thief, but it appears to belong to a Leto lizardman Warrior!", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 12, "title": "Tracking the Lizardmen!", "description": "Maria asks you to track down the lizardmen and retrieve the stolen scroll. Monsters to Hunt - Leto Lizardman WarriorsBrown Scroll ScrapNGx5", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 13, "title": "A Torn Scroll", "description": "You've retrieved the torn scroll from the Leto Lizardmen. Take it to Maria, she'll be able to read it.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 14, "title": "The Crystal of Purity is Complete!", "description": "The crystal of purity is complete! Take it to High Priest Sylvain.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 15, "title": "Sylvain is Satisfied", "description": "High Priest Sylvain wanted you to help Maria make the crystal of purity. Monsters to Hunt - Wastelands, Plains of Dion: Monster Eye Destroyers Breka's Stronghold: Breka Orc Shaman  Dragon Valley, Crater of Ivory Tower: ShacklesShackle's ScalpNGx2", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 18, "title": "Return to Jurek", "description": "You've collected all the items that Jurek requires. Take them to him in Giran Castle Town.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 19, "title": "The Trial of Jurek is Complete", "description": "Jurek has given you a mark as a token of gratitude, and indicates he is still seeking evidence to prove his suspicions. Return to Mirien.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 20, "title": "In Search of Elder Cronos", "description": "Your last assignment is with Elder Cronos in Hunters Village. Go and find him.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 21, "title": "In Search of the Scripture of Knowledge", "description": "Elder Cronos asks you what your purpose is in learning magic. When he is convinced of what you say, he tells you of a book called the Scriptures of Knowledge, which he onced used. Visit Dieter at the Wizard Guild of Giran Castle to obtain the book.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 22, "title": "Finding the Astrologer Again", "description": "Dieter has lost the Scriptures of Knowledge! Consult Astrologer Creta again.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 23, "title": "Astrology of Creta", "description": "Creta gives you a letter of explanation and asks you to deliver it to the owner of the key, saying that she sees several shadows there.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 24, "title": "In Search of Edroc", "description": "Dieter suggests that you speak with Edroc, the son of the owners of the inn they were staying in. He may remember something.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 25, "title": "Warehouse Keeper of the Harbor", "description": "Trader Edroc remembers the incident. He retrieves an envelope they left behind when they departed for Gludin Harbor. Written on the envelope is ‘Warehouse Freightman Raut'.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 26, "title": "The Drunkard's Brother", "description": "Raut gives you the first chapter of the scripture and asks you to forgive his brother's youthful indiscretions. Raut says he doesn't know where the other three chapters are, but suggests you ask his brother and tells you where to find him.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 27, "title": "Finding the Remaining Scriptures of Knowledge", "description": "Triff was the lone survivor of a deadly magical attack. They say that he was able to hide some of the scriptures before the evil spirits took the lot of them..  You must journey afar to complete the Scriptures of Knowledge! Town of Giran: Warehouse Keeper Valkon Town of Dion: Blacksmith Poitan Monster to Hunt - Death Pass: GrandisScripture Chapter 4NG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 28, "title": "In Search of the Scriptures of Knowledge", "description": "Elder Casian regrets that he cannot understand the contents from only one chapter. You must find the rest of the scriptures!  Death Pass: Evil Spirit Grandis Giran Castle Town's Warehouse Keeper Valkon.Scripture Chapter 4NG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 29, "title": "Casian's Magic Ingredient", "description": "Elder Casian asks you for the materials he needs to copy the Scriptures of Knowledge. Monsters to Hunt - Execution Grounds: Ghouls Gorgon Flower Garden: Medusas Death Pass: Fettered Souls Crater of Ivory Tower: Enchanted GargoylesEnchanted Gargoyle's NailNGx5", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2719", "name": "Enchanted Gargoyle's Nail", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 30, "title": "Return to Casian", "description": "You've gotten the materials that Elder Casian needs. Take them to him in the Wastelands.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 31, "title": "An Incomplete Scripture", "description": "The Scriptures of Knowledge are not complete without the introduction and the fifth chapter! Elder Casian is regretful, but there is nothing to be done since they have been destroyed. You've retrieved all of that's left of the Scriptures of Knowledge. Return to Elder Cronos.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 32, "title": "The Truth of the Scripture", "description": "Elder Cronos says that the Scriptures of Knowledge are merely one interpretation of the greater Tablet of Maphr, which contains the ultimate secrets of geometry - translated by the giants from the Gods themselves! He continues to say that the authors had to discontinue their work once it was realized that the dark secrets contained within were too powerful for this world. He is very pleased with you and what you have brought him and gives you something in return. Return to Magister Mirien.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Trial of the Pilgrim
description: The laws of the gods govern the universe although their intentions are not always clear. We must simply live each day with faith... Now, return to Hermit Santiago.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "The Trial of the Pilgrim requires that you learn the ways of the gods by visiting various priests. You should visit Seer Tanapi in the land of the Orcs first.", "npc": {"id": "215", "name": "Santiago", "additional": "Hermit", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "2725", "name": "Essence of Flame", "icon": "etc_gem_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "The Teachings of Pa'agrio", "description": "The Trial of the Pilgrim requires that you learn the ways of the gods by visiting various priests. You should visit Seer Tanapi in the land of the Orcs first.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2725", "name": "Essence of Flame", "icon": "etc_gem_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Ancestor Martankus", "description": "Seer Tanapi tells you that in order to truly understand Pa'agrio, the God of Fire, you must meet Ancestor Martankus within the Cave of Trials!", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2725", "name": "Essence of Flame", "icon": "etc_gem_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "Essence of Flame", "description": "If you wish to understand the true nature of Pa'agrio, Martankus says you must recover the essence of flame from the Forgotten Temple in Gludin Territory.  Monsters to Hunt - Lava SalamandersEssence of FlameNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "2725", "name": "Essence of Flame", "icon": "etc_gem_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 5, "title": "Return to Martankus", "description": "You've got the essence of flame! Take it to Ancestor Martankus in the Cave of Trials.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 6, "title": "Seer Tanapi", "description": "The essence of flame contains the Soul of Pa'agrio. Should it speak to you, be sure to let Seer Tanapi know of what was said.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 7, "title": "The Teachings of Maphr", "description": "You've felt the flame. Now you must learn Maphr's truth. Speak with Gauri Twinklerock in Dwarven Village.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 8, "title": "Which is True?", "description": "To learn the truth of Maphr, meet with Priest Gerald or Wanderer Dorf.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 9, "title": "The Teachings of Einhasad", "description": "The Teachings of Maphr. This is like the two sides of a coin. Find Priest Primos in Giran Castle Town to receive the teachings of Einhasad.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 10, "title": "Journey To Talking Island", "description": "Priest Primos in Giran Castle Town says that he doesn't have anything to tell you. He tells you to go see Priest Petron on Talking Island.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 11, "title": "Kill Nahir", "description": "Priest Petron will teach you and give you your assignment if you'll go to the Elven Ruins and destroy the evil spirit known as Nahir. Monster to Hunt - Nahir", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 12, "title": "Return to Priest Petron", "description": "You've killed the evil creature Nahir. Return to Priest Petron on Talking Island.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 13, "title": "The Teachings of Eva", "description": "The truth of Einhasad is that there's as much jealousy and destruction as there is faith and life in this world. Now you must learn the truth of Eva. Speak with Andellia in Elven Village.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 14, "title": "Defeat the Black Willow", "description": "Eva's priest asks you to kill the Black Willows located at the falls in the Neutral Zone. Then to go meet with Uruha, Priestess of Darkness, to warn her not to bring her evil intentions to the Elven Forest ever again.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 15, "title": "Give a Warning to Uruha", "description": "You've defeated the Black Willow. Now visit Uruha and warn her not to bring her dastardly evil intentions near the Elven Village ever again.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 16, "title": "Book of Darkness", "description": "In pursuit of the teachings of the opposite. You've obtained the Book of Darkness which contains the dark secrets of Shilen! How would Andellia, Eva's child, respond to you now?", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 17, "title": "Elder of the Wastelands", "description": "Your next lesson will be learned from Elder Casian of the Wastelands. He has some very unusual, forgotten knowledge. Go see him.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 18, "title": "To Live a Life with Faith", "description": "The laws of the gods govern the universe although their intentions are not always clear. We must simply live each day with faith... Now, return to Hermit Santiago.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Testimony of Trust
description: You've earned the trust of all the leaders of the tribes. Find High Priest Biotin on Talking Island and obtain the mark of trust.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "High Priest Hollint warns of a huge pending disaster and the dawn of an era of chaos. He gives you a testimony of trust, asking that you work to strengthen the solidarity between the races in preparation for the dark days ahead. You must visit the leaders of all the tribes and obtain their trust. Meet with Hierarch Asterios in Elven Village first.", "npc": {"id": "217", "name": "Hollint", "additional": "High Priest", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "2761", "name": "Heartstone of Porta", "icon": "etc_poison_pouch_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "The Elven Tetrarch", "description": "High Priest Hollint warns of a huge pending disaster and the dawn of an era of chaos. name: Testimony of Life
description: You've delivered the Water of Life to Hierarch Asterios. Now take the amulet he gave you to Master Cardien in the Town of Dion.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Also known as the mother of all forests and fairies, our Mother Tree is dying. Master Cardien says that many young Elves must be sacrificed if she is to be saved and then gives you the testimony of life. Take his letter to Magister Asterios in Elven Village.", "npc": {"id": "218", "name": "Cardien", "additional": "Master", "icon": "skill4416_elf"}, "item": {"id": "3159", "name": "Tears of Unicorn", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "The Time of Trial", "description": "Also known as the mother of all forests and fairies, our Mother Tree is dying. Master Cardien says that many young Elves must be sacrificed if she is to be saved and then gives you the testimony of life. Take his letter to Magister Asterios in Elven Village.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "3159", "name": "Tears of Unicorn", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "The Water of Life", "description": "You must obtain the water of life to revive the Mother Tree. Thalia in the east of Iris Lake knows where to find it. Find her.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "3159", "name": "Tears of Unicorn", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "The Dwarven Blacksmith", "description": "You must first have the grail of purity if you are to obtain the water of life. Blacksmith Pushkin is the only one who knows how to properly handle pure mithril, an essential ingredient of the grail. name: Testimony of Prosperity
description: You've finally obtained Maphr's Tablet! Take it to Warehouse Freightman Parman in Giran Castle Town.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "To complete the first part of the Testimony of Prosperity, you must first find the four proofs of prosperity: the proof of wealth, the proof of fertile lands, the proof of fertility and the proof of a sound body. Warehouse Freightman Parman in Giran Castle Town can tell you more about the details of each of these proofs.Lilith's Elven WaferNG", "npc": {"id": "221", "name": "Parman", "additional": "Warehouse Keeper", "icon": "skill4416_dwarf"}, "item": {"id": "1458", "name": "Crystal (D-Grade)", "icon": "etc_crystal_blue_i00", "grade": "D"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Four Proofs of Prosperity", "description": "To complete the first part of the Testimony of Prosperity, you must first find the four proofs of prosperity: the proof of wealth, the proof of fertile lands, the proof of fertility and the proof of a sound body. Warehouse Freightman Parman in Giran Castle Town can tell you more about the details of each of these proofs.Lilith's Elven WaferNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1458", "name": "Crystal (D-Grade)", "icon": "etc_crystal_blue_i00", "grade": "D"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Return to Parman", "description": "You've collected all four proofs that are symbols of Maphr's prosperity. Return to Warehouse Freightman Parman in Giran Castle Town.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1458", "name": "Crystal (D-Grade)", "icon": "etc_crystal_blue_i00", "grade": "D"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "More Training", "description": "You've completed the first part of the Testimony of Prosperity. Return to Warehouse Freightman Parman in Giran Castle Town after you've reached level 38.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1458", "name": "Crystal (D-Grade)", "icon": "etc_crystal_blue_i00", "grade": "D"}}, {"number": 5, "title": "Maphr's Stone Plate", "description": "You have completed the first part of the Testimony of Prosperity. The second part of the test is to find and bring back Maphr's Tablet on which the secrets of absolute geometry is recorded. For details, go to Maestro Nikola who is located near Cruma Tower and ask him.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1458", "name": "Crystal (D-Grade)", "icon": "etc_crystal_blue_i00", "grade": "D"}}, {"number": 6, "title": "Making an Imprint of the Keyhole", "description": "According to Maestro Nikola, Maphr's Tablet is hidden in a box located somewhere inside the Cruma Tower. However, in order to make a key to open the box, you must first make an imprint of the keyhole. Maestro Nikola has given you the list of materials that are needed to make the key. Collect the materials and then by using the recipe, make a Key of Titan. After that, open the box with the completed key and recover Maphr's Tablet.  Monsters to hunt - Marsh Stakatos, Toad Lords, and Marsh Spiders.Crystal (D-Grade)Dx10", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1458", "name": "Crystal (D-Grade)", "icon": "etc_crystal_blue_i00", "grade": "D"}}, {"number": 9, "title": "The Finished Key", "description": "You have gathered all the materials you need. Now, by using the recipe, make the key and open the Titan's Box.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 10, "title": "Maphr's Stone Plate", "description": "You've finally obtained Maphr's Tablet! name: Test of the Searcher
description: Alex writes you a letter of recommendation to give to Master Luther. Take it to him now!
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "A Searcher has the ability to find hidden things. To obtain the mark of the searcher, visit Alex in Floran Village. name: Test of Magus
description: You've collected the tones of 4 spirits. Return to Rukal to create absolute tone.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "A strange melody is only heard by those who have mastered elemental magic. Parina is the only one who knows it. name: Test of Witchcraft
description: Zeruel has been defeated! Return to Orim of the Shadow.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "The box contains the soul of Aklantoth, a Magus of the dark arts during the Elmoreden era. To open it, you must answer his riddle. Start at the Luxury Shop in Giran Castle Town.", "npc": {"id": "229", "name": "Orim", "additional": "Shadow", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "3332", "name": "Soultrap Crystal", "icon": "etc_gem_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Spirit of the Black Magi", "description": "The box contains the soul of Aklantoth, a Magus of the dark arts during the Elmoreden era. To open it, you must answer his riddle. They were bought by Magister Iker and Dark Elf Kaira in the Town of Giran, and Trader Lara in the Town of Dion, respectively. Ask Nestle in Gludin where the other gems are. You must collect all 6 gems.Aklantoth 6th GemNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "3332", "name": "Soultrap Crystal", "icon": "etc_gem_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "To Orim of the Shadow", "description": "You've collected all 6 gems. You must defeat him before he regains his power!", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "3332", "name": "Soultrap Crystal", "icon": "etc_gem_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 6, "title": "Evil Gone Missing", "description": "The demon has disappeared! Visit Orim of the Shadow and learn how to seal Drevanul Zeruel.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 9, "title": "Searching for Zeruel", "description": "Zeruel is probably disguised as a Human somewhere in Floran Village. He must be dealt with at once! Strike the final blow with the sword of binding!", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 10, "title": "Zeruel Must Be Defeated!", "description": "Drevanul Zeruel's hiding place inside Fisherman Evert has at last been revealed! Return to Orim of the Shadow.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Audience with the Land Dragon
description: Kill the cave keeper and cave maidens in Dragon Valley and get the third abyss jewel. Destroy it and take the fragments to Theodric at the entrance to Antharas' Lair.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "The quest to obtain the portal stone, needed to enter Antharas' Lair. Seal Watchman Gabrielle warns that Antharas has been awakened, and asks you to join the party going to slay the dragon. She says that Antharas' Lair is surrounded by a magical field and is unapproachable, but she thinks that the portal stone may activate the heart of the field and allow one to pass through. Only those acknowledged by the seal watchmen may receive the stone. Follow Gabrielle's instructions and visit the other four watchmen. Complete their assignments and receive their acknowledgements. The four watchmen of the seal are: Magister Kaiena of the Ivory Tower, Prefect Chakiris of the Hunters' Village, Master Kendra of Aden Castle Town and High Priest Orven of Aden Castle Town.", "npc": {"id": "337", "name": "Gabrielle", "additional": null, "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": null}, {"number": 2, "title": "Guardian of the Seals", "description": "The quest to obtain the portal stone, needed to enter Antharas' Lair. Seal Watchman Gabrielle warns that Antharas has been awakened, and asks you to join the party going to slay the dragon. She says that Antharas' Lair is surrounded by a magical field and is unapproachable, but she thinks that the portal stone may activate the heart of the field and allow one to pass through. Only those acknowledged by the seal watchmen may receive the stone. Follow Gabrielle's instructions and visit the other four watchmen. Complete their assignments and receive their acknowledgements. The four watchmen of the seal are: Magister Kaiena of the Ivory Tower, Prefect Chakiris of the Hunters' Village, Master Kendra of Aden Castle Town and High Priest Orven of Aden Castle Town.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 3, "title": "Abyss Jewel", "description": "Gabrielle says that there are those who long for the awakening of Antharas and that you must prevent their entry. She asks you to meet with Warehouse Chief Moke of Gludin and Blacksmith Helton of Oren. After meeting with them, seek and destroy the abyss jewel.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 4, "title": "Watchman of the Land Dragon Antharas", "description": "Take the mark of watchman to Gilmore at the entrance to Dragon Valley.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 5, "title": "Portal Stone", "description": "Kill the cave keeper and cave maidens in Dragon Valley and get the third abyss jewel. Destroy it and take the fragments to Theodric at the entrance to Antharas' Lair.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Alligator Hunter
description: Trader Enverun asks you to join him on a hunting excursion to Alligator Island. He offers to pay you a reward for each Alligator Leathers. Hunt Alligator, Crokian Warrior, Crokian Lad, Farhite. Wharf Manager Nedy and Mineral Trader Raban love gambling. It seems you can get extra Alligator Leathers from them.Alligator LeatherNGx999

name: Under the Shadow of the Ivory Tower

name: Enhance Your Weapon
description: Many Magisters and Maestros have been recruiting volunteers to form a united front against the coming dark days. They have developed methods of strengthening weaponry as a way of empowering individual members of their forces. They tell you that now is the time to grow individual strength to prepare for the approaching darkness and ask you to learn to use enhanced weaponry... Monsters that Soul Crystals can be used on - Antharas' Lair: Malruk Knight, Malruk Berserker, Malruk Lord, Limal Karinness, Karik, Pytan, Pytan Knight Devil's Isle: Bloody Bat, Unpleasant Humming, Death Flyer, Fiend Archer, Musveren, Zaken's Royal Guard, Kaim Vanul, Pirate Zombie Captain, Doll Blader, Vale Master, Sairon, Sairon's Doll, Sairon's Puppet, Light Bringer Timak Outpost: Timak Orc Series, Timak Orc Troop Series Fields of Massacre: Doom Servant, Doom Guard, Doom Archer, Doom Trooper, Doom Warrior, Doom Knight Giants Cave: Halingka, Yintzu, Paliote, Hamrut, Kranrot Forest of Mirrors: Forest of M

name: Black Swan
description: The cargo belonging to the Commercial Guild of Iason Heine has been stolen by Tasaba lizardmen. You are hunting them. Bring back their fangs and Iason Heine will give you a reward. Recover the barrels of league that were stolen and he will give you some bills of Iason Heine worth 700 adena each. If you take them to Head Blacksmith Roman in Heine he will exchange them for items.Bill of Iason HeineNGx999

name: Sorrowful Sound of Flute

steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Dark Elf Nanarin, enchanted at the sight of Dwarf Barbado's bountiful beard, wishes to pursue a relationship with him but her pride keeps her from expressing her true feelings. name: Jovial Accordion
description: Troubadour Swan has agreed to perform in an ensemble. Relay this news to Barbado.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Barbado explains that he has long been an admirer of Swan's music and his fondest wish is to someday play a duet with him. Swan has not responded to his invitation, and Barbado has gotten the impression that Swan is avoiding him. Barbado asks you to visit Swan on his behalf.", "npc": {"id": "364", "name": "Barbado", "additional": "Musician", "icon": "skill4416_dwarf"}, "item": null}, {"number": 2, "title": "Barbado's Request", "description": "Barbado explains that he has long been an admirer of Swan's music and his fondest wish is to someday play a duet with him. name: An Elder Sows Seeds
description: Great Magus Kranvel's spellbook has been opened for the upcoming fight with Beleth. The magic power emanating from the book has destroyed fertile farmland and produced weird and grotesque creatures. Filled with rage and grief, Spellsinger Diena destroyed the magus's spellbook. Rumor says it is now located in the Ant Nest. Elder Casian wishes to open Great Magus Kranvel's spellbook again. Obtain the Great Magus Kranvel's spellbook so he can recultivate the Wastelands. Kill Ant Recruits, Ant Patrols, Ant Guards, Noble Ants and Noble Ant Leaders.Kranvel's Spellbook: Chapter of EarthNG

name: Path to a Human Wizard

steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "The quest to change occupation to Wizard. Parina asks that you find tokens which symbolize earth, fire, water, and wind. name: Path to a Cleric
description: You have received Lionel's covenant not to author any more books. Now return to Priest Zigaunt in the Temple of Einhasad in Gludin Village.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Cleric. Tell Priest Zigaunt that you wish to become a Cleric, and he ask you to prove your pure faith. To do this, you must remove all inappropriate books that criticize the current order. The first rumors about those books appeared in the Town of Gludio. Go there and ask Trader Simplon about the book, 'Understanding of Miracles.' Then recover all the books the trader has sold.Book of PragaNG", "npc": {"id": "405", "name": "Zigaunt", "additional": "Priest", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "1196", "name": "Book of Praga", "icon": "etc_spell_books_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Proof of Faith", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Cleric. Then recover all the books the trader has sold.Book of PragaNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1196", "name": "Book of Praga", "icon": "etc_spell_books_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Recovery of Inappropriate Books", "description": "You have recovered all five books. She asks you to meet an old man named Perrin who gave her this ability and get her money back.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 6, "title": "Let's Interrogate Perrin", "description": "You have defeated Tamil, guard of the evil Perrin. Interrogate him.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 7, "title": "Let's Return to Allana", "description": "You retrieved Allana's money from Perrin. Take it to her. You will find her near the lighthouse.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 8, "title": "Manuel's Urgent Business", "description": "Priest Manuel of the Town of Gludio has contacted you through the crystal for emergency. Go meet him quickly.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 9, "title": "Pursued Girl", "description": "You receive a tip that mercenary lizardmen were hired to kidnap the girl of prophecy. Hurry to the lighthouse in Gludin Harbor and protect her.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 10, "title": "Results of Prophecy", "description": "You could not save the girl's younger brother. Return to Priest Manuel and tell him.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Path to a Palus Knight
description: By carving your name on the coffin, you have become its true owner. Now, take it and return to Master Virgil in the Town of Gludio.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Palus Knight. Master Virgil asks that you capture the 'gaze of abyss' through a trial in order to become a Palus Knight. He says you must then go to the Neutral Zone and bring back 13 Lycanthrope Skulls needed for the 13 Skull Ceremony. This will fulfill the first stage of the trial.Lycanthrope SkullNGx13", "npc": {"id": "410", "name": "Virgil", "additional": "Master", "icon": "skill4416_darkelf"}, "item": {"id": "1242", "name": "Arachnid Tracker Silk", "icon": "etc_skein_gray_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Ritual of 13 Skulls", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Palus Knight. This will fulfill the first stage of the trial.Lycanthrope SkullNGx13", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1242", "name": "Arachnid Tracker Silk", "icon": "etc_skein_gray_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Return to Master Virgil", "description": "You have collected all 13 skulls. name: Path to an Assassin
description: You have returned Shilen's Tears to Witch Arkenia for which she gave you a Recommendation to become an Assassin. Take it to Triskel in the Town of Gludio.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Assassin. name: Path to a Dark Wizard

name: Path to a Shillien Oracle

Magister Sidra explains that to become a Shilien Oracle you must acquire two books written in ancient rune: the 'Garmiel book' and the 'Andariel book'. First you must visit Magister Talbot in the Village of Gludin, and learn how to obtain the Garmiel book.", "npc": {"id": "413", "name": "Sidra", "additional": "Magister", "icon": "skill4416_darkelf"}, "item": {"id": "1268", "name": "Ashen Bones", "icon": "etc_piece_bone_black_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Two Books", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Shillien Oracle. name: Path to an Orc Raider

steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Orc Raider. Prefect Karukia says that Orc Raiders must prove that their courage and loyalty are without fault. To prove your courage you must destroy the Goblins and their Kuruka Ratmen helpers that are ruining this land. Kill Goblin Tomb Raider Leaders and Kuruka Ratman Leaders.Kuruka Ratman ToothNGx10", "npc": {"id": "414", "name": "Karukia", "additional": "Prefect", "icon": "skill4416_orc"}, "item": {"id": "1591", "name": "Head of Betrayer", "icon": "etc_skull_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Defeat Ratman Leader", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Orc Raider. name: Path to a Monk
description: What is Khavatari's Zenith? Think carefully about what Khavatari Aren said and then go back to Seer Moira.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "You must undertake this quest in order to change your occupation to Monk. Gantaki Zu Urutu will instruct you in traditional Orc martial arts. He informs you that you must receive a scroll from two Masters. Go first to Khavatari Rosheek, who is training somewhere on the Immortal Plateau.", "npc": {"id": "415", "name": "Gantaki Zu Urutu", "additional": null, "icon": "skill4416_orc"}, "item": {"id": "1598", "name": "2nd Leather Pouch (Full)", "icon": "etc_pouch_yellow_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Find Khavatari Rosheek.", "description": "You must undertake this quest in order to change your occupation to Monk. Go first to Khavatari Rosheek, who is training somewhere on the Immortal Plateau.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1602", "name": "Scarlet Salamander Scale", "icon": "etc_jewel_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "1st Spirit Scroll", "description": "Khavatari Rosheek says that he doesn't have time to waste on a novice like you. You must use only Dual-Fist-type weapons for this task.Kasha Bear ClawNGx5", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1602", "name": "Scarlet Salamander Scale", "icon": "etc_jewel_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "Return to Khavatari Rosheek", "description": "You have slain five Kasha bears. You will find him near the Frozen Waterfalls.1st Leather Pouch (Full)NG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1599", "name": "3rd Leather Pouch (Full)", "icon": "etc_pouch_yellow_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 5, "title": "2nd Spirit Scroll", "description": "Khavatari Rosheek is meditating. He orders you to slay five Kasha Blade Spiders, collect their claws in a pouch and bring them back to him. You must only use Dual-Fist-type weapons for this task.Kasha Blade Spider TalonNGx5", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1612", "name": "Felim Lizardman Tooth", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 6, "title": "Return to Khavatari Rosheek", "description": "You have collected five claws of Kasha blade spiders in a pouch. He tells you to slay five Scarlet Salamanders, collect their scales in a pouch and bring it back to him. You must only use Dual-Fist-type weapons for this task. . Monsters to Hunt - scarlet salamanders.Scarlet Salamander ScaleNGx5", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "8545", "name": "Kasha Spider's Tooth", "icon": "etc_claw_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 8, "title": "Return to Khavatari Rosheek", "description": "You have collected five scales of scarlet salamanders in a pouch. Take the pouch to Khavatari Rosheek near the Frozen Waterfalls.3rd Leather Pouch (Full)NG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "8546", "name": "Horn of Baar Dre Vanul", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 9, "title": "Fiery Spirit", "description": "Khavatari Rosheek has given you a fiery spirit scroll! Return to Gantaki Zu Urutu in Orc Village.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "8546", "name": "Horn of Baar Dre Vanul", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 10, "title": "Second Scroll", "description": "Prefect Kasman in Gludin Village will tell you about the second scroll you will need to obtain to become a Monk.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "8546", "name": "Horn of Baar Dre Vanul", "icon": "etc_horn_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 11, "title": "Iron Will Scroll", "description": "In order to find the second scroll, you must meet Khavatari Toruku. name: Path to an Orc Shaman
description: The Totem Spirit of Gandi knows of your recent experiences. It told you to seek Seer Moira, who will lead you to a shaman.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Orc Shaman. Tataru Zu Hestui explains that in order to become an Orc Shaman, you must learn to lead spirits. In order to accomplish this, you must master the 'Language of Fire' which will enable you to communicate with spirits. There are three items needed to prepare for learning the language of fire. You must collect the pelt of a Kasha bear, the husk of a Kasha blade spider and a fiery egg of a scarlet salamander. Kasha bears and Kasha blade spiders can be found in the northern Immortal Plateau and scarlet salamanders can be found in the Cave of Trials. Monsters to hunt: Kasha bears, Kasha blade spiders and scarlet salamanders. Monsters to hunt: Kasha bears, Kasha blade spiders and scarlet salamanders.1st Fiery EggNG", "npc": {"id": "416", "name": "Tataru Zu Hestui", "additional": null, "icon": "skill4416_orc"}, "item": {"id": "1625", "name": "Grizzly Blood", "icon": "etc_reagent_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Preparation of Offering", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled to change occupation to Orc Shaman. Tataru Zu Hestui explains that in order to become an Orc Shaman, you must learn to lead spirits. In order to accomplish this, you must master the 'Language of Fire' which will enable you to communicate with spirits. There are three items needed to prepare for learning the language of fire. You must collect the pelt of a Kasha bear, the husk of a Kasha blade spider and a fiery egg of a scarlet salamander. Kasha bears and Kasha blade spiders can be found in the northern Immortal Plateau and scarlet salamanders can be found in the Cave of Trials. Monsters to hunt: Kasha bears, Kasha blade spiders and scarlet salamanders. Monsters to hunt: Kasha bears, Kasha blade spiders and scarlet salamanders.1st Fiery EggNG", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1625", "name": "Grizzly Blood", "icon": "etc_reagent_red_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "Tataru zu Hestui", "description": "You have collected all three items. name: Path to become a Scavenger
description: Master Toma gives you shining beads and asks that you give them to Warehouse Chief Yasheni of the Town of Schuttgart.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "This quest must be fulfilled before transferring to Scavenger class. Collector Pippi of the Dwarven Village encourages all aspiring Dwarves to become Scavengers. To become a Scavenger, you must receive the permission of Master Toma, whose whereabouts are currently unknown. It is said that his younger sister, Trader Mion of Dwarven Village, may know his whereabouts.", "npc": {"id": "417", "name": "Pippi", "additional": "Collector", "icon": "skill4416_dwarf"}, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "In Search of Master Toma - Part 1", "description": "This quest must be fulfilled before transferring to Scavenger class. Collector Pippi of the Dwarven Village encourages all aspiring Dwarves to become Scavengers. To become a Scavenger, you must receive the permission of Master Toma, whose whereabouts are currently unknown. It is said that his younger sister, Trader Mion of Dwarven Village, may know his whereabouts.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "In Search of Master Toma - Part 2", "description": "Trader Mion promises to find the location of Master Toma. In exchange, you have agreed to help her with her business. She asks you to deliver some items to her customers.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "In Search of Master Toma - Part 3", "description": "Trader Mion promises to find the location of Master Toma. In exchange, you have agreed to help her with her business. But she is making unreasonable demands.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 5, "title": "In Search of Master Toma - Part 4", "description": "Take the letter you got from Trader Mion to Master Toma. Master Toma can be found in the Abandoned Coal Mines east of Dwarven Village, the easternmost part of the Dwarven Kingdom, or perhaps somewhere on the northern coast.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 6, "title": "Honey Jar Spoil", "description": "Master Toma said that if you want to be a scavenger, you must first run an errand for him. He asked you to bring him back five honey jars. You can obtain them by using Spoil on honey bears. You can find honey bears while hunting hunter bears. In order to find hunter bears, start from the western entrance of the Abandoned Coal Mines, then go up north until you reach the area where two shorelines merge. A large population of hunter bears are said to be found in that area. Monsters to hunt - hunter bears and honey bears. Monsters to use Spoil on - honey bears.Honey JarNGx5", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 7, "title": "Return toma", "description": "You have found all five honey jars. Let Master Toma's mouth be filled with the sweetness of honey!Honey JarNGx5", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 8, "title": "Bead of Tarantula", "description": "As your next assignment, Master Toma asks you to bring him 20 tarantula beads. They can be obtained by using Spoil on hunter tarantulas and plunder tarantulas. Monsters to use Spoil on - hunter tarantulas and plunder tarantulas.BeadNGx20", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 9, "title": "Return toma", "description": "You have collected 20 beads. Take them to Master Toma.BeadNGx20", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "1656", "name": "Bead", "icon": "etc_crystal_ball_blue_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 10, "title": "Pay Back for the Drink", "description": "Take the package of beads Master Toma gave you to Warehouse Freightman Raut in Gludin Village.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 11, "title": "In Search of Raut's Nephew", "description": "Warehouse Freightman Raut asks you to deliver Raut's teleport scroll to his nephew. His nephew lives in Dragon Valley.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 12, "title": "Return to Raut", "description": "You have delivered Raut's Teleport Scroll torai. Take the succubus undies you received to Warehouse Freightman Raut in Gludin Village.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 13, "title": "Toma's Friend", "description": "Master Toma gives you shining beads and asks that you give them to Warehouse Chief Yasheni of the Town of Schuttgart.", "npc": null, "item": null}]

name: Path to an Artisan
