What do you think you should do?", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 11, "title": "A Thoughtless Person", "description": "Lockirin of Dwarven Village will instruct you on your next task.", "npc": null, "item": null}, {"number": 12, "title": "Message Delivered", "description": "Mineral Trader Hitch tells you to go back and visit Obi once more. name: Get a Pet
description: To receive a pet, you must earn the approval of Pet Manager Martin in Gludin Village. He says that you must have love for and knowledge of animals to prove that you deserve a pet. He asks you to return to your hometown, eliminate all animal killers and return to him.

name: Little Wing
description: Take the eggs to Fairy Mimyu.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Quest that must be completed in order to obtain a pet hatchling. Visit Pet Manager Cooper and tell him that you wish to raise a hatchling. name: Little Wing's Big Adventure
description: Your hatchling has drunk the sap of all four fairy trees-- the wind, star, twilight and abyss. The preparations for its growth have been completed. Return to Fairy Mimyu.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Elder Cronos suggests you consult Fairy Mimyu concerning the raising of Hatchling to Strider.", "npc": {"id": "421", "name": "Cronos", "additional": "Elder", "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "4325", "name": "Fairy Leaf", "icon": "etc_leaf_green_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "In Search of Mimyu", "description": "Elder Cronos suggests you consult Fairy Mimyu concerning the raising of Hatchling to Strider.", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "4325", "name": "Fairy Leaf", "icon": "etc_leaf_green_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 3, "title": "The Sap of Fairy Trees", "description": "Fairy Mimyu examines your hatchling and tells you the story of the four fairy trees and their guardians. She tells you to feed the sap of these trees to your hatchling. Go to each of the four fairy trees of wind, star, twilight and abyss and let your hatchling drink their sap. You must guard your hatchling as it drinks. When it has finished drinking, attach a fairy leaf to the fairy tree.Fairy LeafNGx4", "npc": null, "item": {"id": "4325", "name": "Fairy Leaf", "icon": "etc_leaf_green_i00", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 4, "title": "Return to Fairy Mimyu", "description": "Your hatchling has drunk the sap of all four fairy trees-- the wind, star, twilight and abyss. name: Proof of Clan Alliance
description: You have passed the test of Witch Kalis and received a Voucher of Faith. Now, go to Giran Castle Town and meet with Sir Kristof Rodemai, a true hero. He is waiting for your return.
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Quest that must be completed in order to raise a clan level to level 4. Sir Kristof Rodemai of the Town of Giran is seeking a clan leader to restore order in the kingdom. Find Sir Rodemai and speak to him. He will say that he cannot join forces with someone whose skills are yet unproven, and recommends you to first attempt and pass the trial of Witch Kalis. If you complete her test and return safely, he promises to give you the 'Alliance Manifesto,' which will thus expand the clan's powers and influences. name: Pursuit of Clan Ambition!
description: Are you going to give the scepter of judgment to Sir Gustav Athebaldt or just talk to him about it?
steps: [{"number": 1, "title": "Start NPC", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled in order to raise a clan to level 5. Upon meeting Sir Gustav Athebaldt in the Town of Oren, he expresses his desire to aid the young and courageous leaders of the kingdom. He promises to give you the 'Seal of Aspiration,' which is needed when expanding the clan's powers and influences should you agree to join forces with him. Sir Athebaldt asks you to help him prepare for the attack against the dragon Antharas; and tells you to go meet Marvin in the Town of Giran.", "npc": {"id": "503", "name": "Sir Gustav Athebaldt", "additional": null, "icon": "skill4416_human"}, "item": {"id": "3869", "name": "Scepter of Judgment", "icon": "etc_royal_seal_of_lord_i04", "grade": "NG"}}, {"number": 2, "title": "Sir Gustav's Business", "description": "Quest that must be fulfilled in order to raise a clan to level 5. name: An Aged Ex-Adventurer
description: During the adventure, you come across a former adventurer, all soulshots are run out at a dangerous hunting ground... and spare the soulshots to the old man with limited mobility. Let's go find out if the old man went back home safely by meeting his daughter-in-law Sarah at the grocery store in the town of Oren...
